description:
The 'osapi_max_limit' has been renamed to 'max_limit' since Ida4ee57d6e1822e35e3198f6d3a89410e211d57d.
So `osapi_max_limit' should be replaced with 'max_limit' in the API reference.
title: api-ref: `osapi_max_limit' should be replaced with 'max_limit'

comments.content:
The 'osapi_max_limit' has been renamed to 'max_limit' since Ida4ee57d6e1822e35e3198f6d3a89410e211d57d.
So `osapi_max_limit' should be replaced with 'max_limit' in the API reference.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~natsume-takashi
